name: twoem-online-productions
description: TWOEM ONLINE PRODUCTIONS- Document Management and Eulogy Services

scripts.install-all: cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python -m uvicorn server:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && yarn install && yarn build

author: TWOEM ONLINE PRODUCTIONS
